Name: Popup Tactics
Effect: Player Hand Size is reduced by 1
Victory Bonus: Player Hand Size is increased by 1

Name: Nullifier
Effect: The first time you Dig every turn is ineffective
Victory Bonus: The first time you trash Static on your turn, Dig an additional time.

Name: Scrapper Hostilities
Effect: Whenever a player is made to discard a card, they lose 1 life
Victory Bonus: The first time you gain life on your turn, draw a card.

Name: Burner Protocol
Effect: Whenever a Static is trashed, Active Player takes 1 damage
